about_the_game:
"HEAD GIRl" stole "WOLWOLSOON" so "FROG" should come.

It's simple, right? But there are some problems with that.






First of all, "FROG" is a bit of a quirky guy.

FROG, a jumping ax master, has a body that can only jump.
If you press the left/right buttons, you go down that direction and attack,
At this time, if you have no enemies, You hit the floor and jump forward.
However, there is a limit to climbing too steep a terrain, so be careful.
This alone can solve everything from moving/attacking/avoiding.






Next, the background is in the middle of the sea.

Of course, frogs hate seawater so much that it is very dangerous.
Some seafood that live in the sea there are very deadly to frogs.
Sea pigeons are especially dangerous, so it's better to deal with them before you wake up.






Lastly, there is a HEAD GIRl flying around who has to break the head.

So the FROG goes after him in a lot of trouble, but the HEAD GIRl runs away easily.
I think it's probably flying around using bubble gum, but I don't know the exact principle.
It may seem cowardly, but she has to understand this because she only has a head.






The bottom line is to fight hard and catch a HEAD GIRl who will bring WOLWOLSOON.
But then it looks too hard, so let me give you a tip.


With his long practice, the FROG learned "PANG JUMP" to jump anywhere.
It can also avoid attacks from seafood and jump on water or foam.
And you can climb steep terrain that is difficult to climb.
Pang jump is difficult because you have to press your foot just before it hits the target
But if you learn this well, you can split the HEAD GIRl at once and get WOLWOLSOON.

Then shall we go split the head?
detailed_description:
"HEAD GIRl" stole "WOLWOLSOON" so "FROG" should come.

It's simple, right? But there are some problems with that.






First of all, "FROG" is a bit of a quirky guy.

FROG, a jumping ax master, has a body that can only jump.
If you press the left/right buttons, you go down that direction and attack,
At this time, if you have no enemies, You hit the floor and jump forward.
However, there is a limit to climbing too steep a terrain, so be careful.
This alone can solve everything from moving/attacking/avoiding.






Next, the background is in the middle of the sea.

Of course, frogs hate seawater so much that it is very dangerous.
Some seafood that live in the sea there are very deadly to frogs.
Sea pigeons are especially dangerous, so it's better to deal with them before you wake up.






Lastly, there is a HEAD GIRl flying around who has to break the head.

So the FROG goes after him in a lot of trouble, but the HEAD GIRl runs away easily.
I think it's probably flying around using bubble gum, but I don't know the exact principle.
It may seem cowardly, but she has to understand this because she only has a head.






The bottom line is to fight hard and catch a HEAD GIRl who will bring WOLWOLSOON.
But then it looks too hard, so let me give you a tip.


With his long practice, the FROG learned "PANG JUMP" to jump anywhere.
It can also avoid attacks from seafood and jump on water or foam.
And you can climb steep terrain that is difficult to climb.
Pang jump is difficult because you have to press your foot just before it hits the target
But if you learn this well, you can split the HEAD GIRl at once and get WOLWOLSOON.

Then shall we go split the head?
name: CROAK CROAK ON THE SEA demo
short_description: A frog trapped alone on an uninhabited island in the middle of the sea. One day, a suspicious head comes flying there. And a dear friend of the missing frog. A frog holding a rusty axe in his hand for the first time in a long time. Can the frog find a friend?
